name: Oil Fight
description:
Oil Fight

Prototype game to practice coding and working in Unity, made for class with the theme "Climate Change".

An oil factory has been polluting your hometown. Now, you've finally had enough, you decide to destroy the factory. Being the reigning dodgeball champion, Lilly has the ability to demolish buildings with only her throw! Destroy as many buildings as possible before the police arrive and time runs out!

Instructions

  • Left-click : grab object (the sphere indicates the distance you can grab at)
  • Right-click : release object
  • WASD : move
  • Esc : Exit game

made by poddlesli
